programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: TRAIN TO BUSAN
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: RETURN OF THE MAFIA
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Just for You S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Top Singers S1 Ep690
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1096
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Girls Tease S1 Ep29
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Venus Online S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Venus Online is a vibrant lifestyle and beauty show featuring the latest in makeup, skincare, and fashion. Each episode shares practical tips and fun challenges that inspire confidence and celebrate personal style.

programme.title: Battle Tour - EastvsWest S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.title: Mr.Player S1 Ep574
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower S1 Ep1
programme.desc: After leaving reformatory, Xin Xiong joins a gang to make a living and soon he becomes a leader of the gang. He takes protection fees from vendors and works hard to 'maintain the local order' in his way. He has thus developed a very good relationship with the law enforcement unit. Later, a teahouse owner Gui Zhu has fallen in love with Xin Xiong who loves Yue Gui. The triangle relationship is entangled with jealousy.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower S1 Ep2
programme.desc: After leaving reformatory, Xin Xiong joins a gang to make a living and soon he becomes a leader of the gang. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa S1 Ep305
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep231
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his father's serious illness.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80's, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: After it is discovered that the drugs seized on the Chinese ships had been planted by the henchman of a notorious drug cartel leader named Naw Khar, the governments of Thailand, Laos, Myanmar and China launched a joint task force to apprehend the criminal by sending a band of elite narcotics officers to the Golden Triangle to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Xiao Fei is a cheerful girl who has been abandoned by her mother. One day, she encounters a gifted young man named Zi Wai, who is battling a rare disease. Determined to help him, she embarks on a journey to find his lost love. Even when they discover that the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: Detective vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society's conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhen's family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husband's departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Gangster Chen Da Qi rises to the upper echelons of power, but finds himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions, Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika's mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: On its maiden flight, an A380 airliner is hijacked by armed gunmen. Among the passengers is international security expert Gao Hao Jun, whose daughter has been taken hostage, putting her life in grave danger. Determined to save her, Gao confronts the hijackers head-on. Can he rescue all the passengers and thwart the crisis?

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: Echoes Of The Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment, and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them, he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas' pursuit.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam's empire.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu's enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar winner Christoph Waltz). programme.desc: Why Raeliana Handed Her A Handkerchief - It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Summer Demon - Visit the ancient retainer that exorcises evil. Nico's mother, Ibuki, has delivered a new prophecy. Ibuki has an idea who this ancient retainer could be, and tells Nico and her familiars to visit them. They were a bit of a ways away, so Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Nemu head to the lands where this ancient retainer lives with a summer vacation feeling.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Miharu Kiryu, The Vampire / Missing Parasol / I'm So Glad You're Here - The vampire Miharu Kiryu has moved into the Otogi household. Because he's a vampire, he tends to be a nightowl and lazily doesn't wake up until past noon. On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Egosurfing - Actress Akane struggles to stand out in "Now Gachi," acting out but failing to get the desired response, leading to growing anxiety.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Buzz - Aqua saves Akane from a dangerous situation, and she decides to continue the show. Aqua then works to dispel the biases against her.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S1 Ep8
programme.desc: First Time - Akane perfectly impersonate Ai, uncovering her hidden child, which piques Aqua's strong interest in her.

programme.desc: The Male Beauty Pageant - The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the woMen's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Too Late - Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kohei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First Buddy - Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Story Of Canals - Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Shock! - Mallow comes to Astrantia to help refinance the viscount's territory, and there is something Kenichi needs to tell him.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Kara And Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad - Dressed in a miko's outfit, Nico and Kuku are helping out Kara's father, who is the head priest at a shrine. While helping out, Nico uses the spell Ani-snippy from shide paper, and creates a moving paper cat. Kara also wanted to create a flying bird, but the shape didn't come out too well and couldn't take flight. But the shape she cut out was so terrible that it looks like a shikigami and ended up creating a life?

programme.title: Spy Kids: All The Time In The World
programme.desc: The action packed franchise is backwith the next generation of Spy Kids!

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Dan is a struggling rancher who volunteers to safely deliver Ben Wade, the captured leader of a gang of thieves, to a train station where the 3:10 to Yuma will transport him to trial. Ben's gang of cutthroats and robbers has other plans.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: Two firefighter brothers clash while battling deadly arsons in Chicago. With explosive action and a gripping mystery, Backdraft stars Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, and Robert De Niro.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the games.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: The Kingdom

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme battles terrorists at a hockey game to save the Vice President and stop a stadium bombing in this explosive thriller. Can he stall the game long enough? It's Sudden Death!

programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Having learnt where a hippos aggression comes from Steve wants to find out if we can live alongside the animal that kills up to 500 people a year. He visits St.Lucia, a town where hippos roam the streets freely at night, feeding on the manicured lawns and bushes of the townsfolk. In order to see them out of the water he must come back at night.

programme.desc: The Arid Heart - In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Stranded In Hell - Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Stranded on a deserted island off the west coast of Panama, Cyril and his team are in survival mode. Cyril is trying to catch a huge Dienton, a large predator with huge teeth.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Salmon - Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the second part of Nick Knowles' remarkable Mongolian adventure Nick heads to The Nadaam Festival, a vibrant celebration of the ancient skills that were once required to become a warrior.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Law and Order - In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season's fury.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa's east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africa's borders...

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Save the Giants - The wild coastline of Mozambique stretches along more than 1,600 miles - an area teeming with a diversity of marine life. Some of the world's largest filter feeders are attracted to this nutrient-rich water. But even these large creatures are defenceless against reckless overfishing. Two of Mozambique's leading marine researchers, Andrea Marshall and Nakia Cullain, set out to find one of the ocean's most secretive animals and protect its most well known, before its too late.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It's a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep1

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Usa - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deadly Intruders - Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snake Face Off - Launch into spring's snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer's soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat's strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat's teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Europe - From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe's evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it's not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer's soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Reptile Runabout - Weave through Queensland's coastal chaos, where Jess faces her fears chasing a lace monitor lizard up a tree with an active beehive. Watch Stu cut a trapped eastern brown out of a fence and see Mick hunt a slippery python for terrified homeowners.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hot and Bothered - Dive into tight spaces, underneath hot houses, and into tense rescue situations as the catchers confront a six-foot-long, highly venomous brown snake. Then watch Stu and Liv relocate a coastal python threatening the safety of a homeowner's pets.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta's loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the Lens - Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the region's species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team's solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who's ready to fly.

programme.desc: Adventurous Cooking - Mary joins Michael Ball on stage in the West End to teach him some new and exciting recipes - ideal for a keen cook who wants to be a little more adventurous.

programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 5 - Jason is on the beach in the coastal area of Jumeirah to delve into the art of pickling.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep7
programme.desc: Hove and Upton Grey - George tackles a cottage conundrum to solve traipsing through its only bedroom to get to its only bathroom. And will a couple's plans to turn their loft into a cinema turn out to be a horror show?

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep7
programme.desc: Liskeard Cornwall Revisit 2023 - In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 4 - Rachel and Mike were thrilled when they found a reasonably priced, spacious home in which to raise their children. It didn't take long living in it to discover its flaws.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S5 Ep7
programme.desc: Glenapp Castle, Scotland - Monica Galetti and Rob Rinder discover Glenapp Castle, where guests are treated to a magical stay that is both rugged and luxurious - and thoroughly Scottish.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 4 - Jamie demonstrates how to make great dishes from frozen food. Jamie makes a sumptuous frozen fish Pie, a one pan spicy chicken dish and creamy frozen cauliflower spaghetti. Jamie introduces a great dish for batch cooking, Minestrone soup and cheesy garlic bread and ends with a microwave chocolate pudding.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mallorca - Ravneet Gill and Fred enjoy some marvellous Mallorcan munch as they dine at Ca Na Toneta and culinary hot spot Patiki, before sampling the famous ensamada breakfast pastry.

programme.desc: Liskeard Cornwall Revisit 2023 - In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.

programme.desc: Hotel Hubertus, Italy - Christmas Special - In the Alpine Tyrol region of Northern Italy lies Hotel Hubertus - a family run resort which offers spectacular views of the surrounding mountains thanks to its extraordinary architecture. Rob and Monica discover the unique Heaven and Hell spa, local ski experiences and are welcomed into the family behind the vision.

programme.desc: Back-To-School Week - The bakers make classic canteen flapjacks, nostalgic school cake and a spectacular school fete Showstopper. Who'll be top of the class, and who will Mr Hollywood and Ms Leith expel from the tent?

programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep5

Chetna Makan shows viewers a great and simple dish to batch cook, chicken curry.

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts S1 Ep2

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi's building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isn't an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Shack Attack - "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot Qilin and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he's been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn't be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep's traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn't until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it's time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Ride or Die - After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms' excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. The Barbapapa decide to save energy.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Lifts Up City Hall - A herd of bison are migrating through Builder Cove-right toward City Hall! Rubble & Crew hop in their big vehicles to save the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep309
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Alphorn - Farmer Zoe has a new goat on her farm! But when she can't find the singing goat, the pups team up with Park Ranger Rose.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1009
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Gold Finding Machine - The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control and takes Uncle Otis on a wild ride.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Present / Movie / Vinny - Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Lifts Up City Hall - A herd of bison are migrating through Builder Cove-right toward City Hall! Rubble & Crew hop in their big vehicles to save the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep309
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Alphorn - Farmer Zoe has a new goat on her farm! But when she can't find the singing goat, the pups team up with Park Ranger Rose.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep301
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mermaid Party - Lily's mermaid-themed birthday party is called off when it starts to rain. Time for a construction solution!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Dora's Song For Papi / Pirate Piggies - Dora travels across the rainforest, creating a song for her dad so they can celebrate Papi-Dora day!/Dora is ready for the Churro Fiesta when the Pirate Piggies eat all the churros.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep713
programme.desc: Arcade Adventure - Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle are at the arcade-and Sparkle's got her eye on an amazing glitter rocket!But,when she doesn't have enough tickets for the rocket, the friends must jump inside different video games.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Moon Cow / Nebulator / Space Bug - Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner. Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure. Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Lifts Up City Hall - A herd of bison are migrating through Builder Cove-right toward City Hall! Rubble & Crew hop in their big vehicles to save the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep309
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Alphorn - Farmer Zoe has a new goat on her farm! But when she can't find the singing goat, the pups team up with Park Ranger Rose.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups Save the Glasses - Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Rebels / Barbascience - Barbidur and Barbalala become little rebels. But who are the Barbapapa?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches - Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Shooting Star / Ball / Balloon - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Tool Duel - Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap'n Turbot's boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog - An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep19
programme.desc: Too Loud, Thomas! - After Thomas loses his voice, he must find a new way to pass on a very important message.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep20
programme.desc: Out of Site - Brenda learns that it is important to work as a team and not just care about her own jobs.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep14
programme.desc: Yong Bao and the Tiger - Yong Bao tells Thomas the story of how he came to have a magnificent tiger emblem on his tender.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep19
programme.desc: Cleo's First Snow - Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realizes there's more to the job than he first thought.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep20
programme.desc: Thomas' Animal Friends - Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realizes that it also involves being decorated as a monkey.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Map Readers - Glitch races the Go Jetters across the Academy to find the lost G.O. Dome of the Ancients.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Shopping Shenanigans, Istanbul, Turkey - Glitch's wishes cause underground trouble in Istanbul - an ancient ceiling may collapse!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep21
programme.desc: It's Time to Eat Green Banana and Saltfish - JoJo wants to bake banana loaf for Jared, who's coming to dinner, but the bananas are too green. It's time for a Gran Gran plan - what can they make with green bananas?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It's Time to Explore the Park - JoJo and Gran Gran have a relaxing yoga class with Auntie Dee before using their senses to enjoy a day at the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep13
programme.desc: Laid Back Shane - Shane is having too much fun to stop and refuel. That is, until he runs out of coal and is stranded in the hot, red desert.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Mr Monkeyjocks - Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Double Babysitter - When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sweetieland Saga - Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sailing Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep50
programme.desc: The Key Badge - Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. It's a key. But what does it do? Duggee has his key badge, they can find out through trial and error.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA - On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Komodo National Park, Indonesia - When Grandmaster Glitch supersizes a fierce Komodo dragon, the Go Jetters must act fast!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Ben, England - The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Pippa's Zimbabwean Nyama - Pippa's tasty nyama uses a young cabbage leaf called spring greens, along with lots of other delicious ingredients. Pippa's table is animal themed, using zebra prints and a toy giraffe!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby European Pond Turtle - In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep21
programme.desc: Sandcastle Squish - Seaweed arrives on deck playing a new game called Sandcastle Squish on his console, but Captain Captain takes it off him and quickly becomes obsessed with it, neglecting her captain's duties. It's up to the pirates to try and get her to stop playing the game.

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Elephant Gets the Blues - The toys are having a racing game.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Pool - Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Wagon Ride - Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Hope at Life's End S1 Ep4001

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights S1 Ep2070
programme.desc: Our cyclist travels three large rivers in central Japan: the Kiso, the Nagara and the Ibi. He explores unique cultures related to the rivers, like cormorant fishing and an exciting float festival.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends S1 Ep4034
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u&i S1 Ep4036
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Little Charo S1 Ep6116
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-13.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini S1 Ep6032
programme.desc: Male cosmetics and hair removal treatments are increasingly popular in Japan. Historically, Japanese men have used makeup for over a thousand years. We look at the evolution of male aesthetics.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan S1 Ep6045
programme.desc: Cats show off their climbing skills at a spot overlooking the sea. On the island of Mushima, we meet a cat who takes us to a field of daffodils. The cats tease Iwago by hiding among the flowers.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini S1 Ep6024
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work S1 Ep2078
programme.desc: Today: asking someone to repeat and clarify. Do Cong Uan, from Vietnam, works at a metalworking company. In a roleplay challenge, he must ask a superior to repeat and clarify what they said.

Ode Osbourne participates in a youth mentorship program, where he delivers an impactful message to the SASA Squad Foundation.
